Package com.skloch.game.events

Class GameStatsUpdatedEvent

java.lang.Object
com.skloch.game.events.GameStatsUpdatedEvent
public class GameStatsUpdatedEvent extends Object
The GameStatsUpdatedEvent class represents an event that is triggered when the game statistics are updated. This event carries the updated game statistics including the day seconds, day, hours of recreational activities, hours studied, meals eaten, and hours slept.
